# Portfolio Website Project

This is a modern Next.js 15 portfolio website with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/ui.

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 15 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Shadcn/ui components
- ESLint & Prettier

## Project Structure

- Landing page with hero section
- About section
- Projects showcase
- Skills section
- Contact form
